classScheduleInformation: A student registered in one or more Art & Design course(s) exhibiting this message, will be assessed a $95 facility use fee once each term.
courseSectionInformation: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. Prerequisite: ARTF 102. Open to Art and Design majors only.
description: Continuation of ARTF 102 that includes the following drawing concepts: narrative, conceptual, applied, non-objective, format, process, seriality and collage. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. Prerequisite: ARTF 102. Open to Art and Design majors only.
label: Drawing II
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Graphic Design or Crafts or History of Art or Photography or Industrial Design or Painting or Sculpture or Art Education or Art Foundation or New Media major(s).
